DESCRIPTION.<MODEL_ID>.Docker.<VALUES>: A Docker workload definition (single container or docker compose).
DESCRIPTION.<MODEL_ID>.Docker.<VALUES>.Name.<VALUES>: Logical name for the workload (container name, or compose project label).
DESCRIPTION.<MODEL_ID>.Docker.<VALUES>.Location.<VAL: Local directory used for build/download context or as a working directory anchor for related operations. Required for all jobs (can point at the compose project directory for compose jobs).
DESCRIPTION.<MODEL_ID>.Docker.<VALUES>.Image.<VALUES: Docker image name to pull/run for single-container jobs (docker run). Not required for compose jobs (compose.yml owns images/build).
DESCRIPTION.<MODEL_ID>.Docker.<VALUES>.Port.<VALUES>: Port mapping in HOST:CONTAINER format for single-container jobs (docker run). Not required for compose jobs.
DESCRIPTION.<MODEL_ID>.Docker.<VALUES>.Download.<VAL: Optional URL to download Docker build assets (zip) for single-container jobs. If omitted, the Download action performs a no-op for that job.
DESCRIPTION.<MODEL_ID>.Docker.<VALUES>.TmpDir.<VALUE: Temporary directory used for Docker downloads. Only needed when Download is provided.
DESCRIPTION.<MODEL_ID>.Docker.<VALUES>.ComposeFile.<: Path to a docker-compose.yml (or any compose file). If provided, this job uses docker compose up/down/build.
DESCRIPTION.<MODEL_ID>.Docker.<VALUES>.ComposeDir.<V: Optional working directory for compose commands. If omitted, the directory containing ComposeFile is used.
DESCRIPTION.<MODEL_ID>.Docker.<VALUES>.ComposeContai: List of container names that belong to the compose workload. Used for status checks (all must be running).
DESCRIPTION.<MODEL_ID>.Docker.<VALUES>.Tests.<VALUES: Optional list of smoke tests to run for this workload. Each test entry has a label and a path to an executable script (or a directory to run with pytest).
Human-readable name for the test shown in output logs.
Filesystem path to the test script (must be executable) or a directory (runs `pytest .` in that directory).
